title: Google Cloud Platform
summary: Google Cloud Platform (GCP), offered by Google, is a suite of cloud computing services that runs on the same infrastructure that Google uses internally for its end-user products, such as Google Search, Gmail, Google Drive, and YouTube.[3] Alongside a set of management tools, it provides a series of modular cloud  services including computing, data storage, data analytics and machine learning.[4] Registration requires a credit card or bank account details.[5]
